attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The all-new Honda Fit offers outstanding efficiency, comfort, and class-leading specifications.
The design is new, the infotainment system is up to date, there are plenty of places to charge things and the screens are high-resolution. The powertrain is on point too; those who are particularly concerned with fuel economy will appreciate the Fit’s light consumption figures.
Class-leading is the best way to describe the cabin space in the Fit. It’s very comfortable inside and passenger space is certainly at the top of the hatchback segment. This vehicle comes standard with a 5 year/200000km warranty and a 4 year/60000km service plan and 3 years AA Road Assist. Book your test drive today!
Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.

attributes.description: What a pleasure to drive this refined beast. This SEXY saloon is a well built machine with exhilarating power. Guaranteed to turn heads. Well specced with Keyless Entry and Keyless Stop Start, Cruise Control with adaptive braking and acceleration, Multi Function Steering with Paddle Shift, Front and Rear PDC with a Reverse Camera, Navigation, Harmon Kardon Sound, Bluetooth Connectivity and much, much more. The driver modes are not just there for show but display significant differences which are a lot of fun. Contact our team for further information. Speak to Gavin De Vries, Tebogo Maledu, Herman Smit or Evert Breedt
